DOC.detailed_description: Single centre , randomise , double-blind , comparator study demonstrate superiority salmeterol/fluticasone propionate combination product 50/100mcg bd fluticasone propionate 100mcg bd respect improvement airway physiology ( sRAW ) adult persistent asthma treat 4 week .

DOC.criteria: Inclusion : Physician document diagnosis asthma present least 6 month . Receiving total daily dose 200500mcg/day beclomethasone dipropionate equivalent least 4 week prior start runin period . Exclusion : Has 3 course oral corticosteroid 12 month previous visit 1
